title: Floral Diamond Vaddanam Pendant - A Contemporary Take on Tradition
materials: Set with brilliant-cut diamonds. Diamonds of VS clarity and G-H color. Hyderabadi Polish ensuring long-lasting shine and brilliance.
features: This pendant boasts a unique floral design with intricate diamond settings. The openwork design gives it a light and airy feel, perfect for the modern bride. The triple floral arrangement is reminiscent of traditional South Indian motifs while maintaining a contemporary aesthetic. The diamonds are meticulously set to maximize brilliance, creating a dazzling effect. Designed to be used as a detachable Vaddanam pendant or as a stylish necklace pendant.
occasions: or any grand occasion. Its modern design also makes it perfect for upscale parties and events. A stunning piece for a Half-Saree function or a Seemantham ceremony
adding a touch of contemporary flair to traditional attire.
description: This pendant effortlessly blends traditional South Indian design with modern aesthetics, making it a versatile piece for any jewelry collection. The high-quality diamonds and expert craftsmanship ensure lasting brilliance and value. Its detachable design offers flexibility, allowing it to be worn as a vaddanam/Odyanam pendant or a striking necklace pendant. A statement piece that exudes sophistication and grace.
